## utils.dom.hasClass() function

Checks if an element has the specified CSS class. Similar to Closure's goog.dom.classes.has, except it handles SVG elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hasClass(element: Element, className: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | Element | DOM element to check. |
|  className | string | Name of class to check.  True if class exists, false otherwise.  Blockly.utils.dom.hasClass |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
